note.p: American. Third daughter of Ebenezer Backus Jones, merchant, of Penn Yan, New York. Married Thomas Adams Knickerbacker (1838–1922), banker, in 1862.
Lineage book of the daughters of the American colonists 5: 158 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
United States Federal Census 1850 (Milo, Yates, New York [1]/196b), 1880 (Troy, Rensselaer, New York 128/7A) (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
